title: Draft a Counter Offer
description: A seller wants to accept a buyer's offer but with a higher price. The agent must draft a counter offer.

tasks.description: Confirm the exact terms of the counter offer with the seller (e.g., new price).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has clear instructions on the new price to propose.

tasks.description: Draft the counter offer form with the new price, referencing the original purchase agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: The counter offer document is accurately filled out.

tasks.description: Send the counter offer to the seller for signature, and then forward the signed copy to the buyer's agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: The counter offer is signed and delivered to the other party.
